entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
